name: carbonfootprintfrommotorbike
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool carbonfootprint.
Tool description: Calculate the carbon footprint in various situations, such as travel and hydro usage.
API description: Calculates the CO2 emissions in kilograms (Kg) from a motorbike travel based on the type of motorbike and the distance traveled.

type.description: The type of motorbike. Can be one of 'SmallMotorBike', 'MediumMotorBike', or 'LargeMotorBike'.
